1.02.title: MUST, SQUASH, BUGS üò°üëâüêõ
1.02.description:
Previous update (1.01) introduced a regression in loading times,
which should be fixed with this update.
Also, label colors should now load properly for those who use Beta versions of After-Effects on MacOS.

This update is small, but may grately improve your experience with Skew.

Thank you for your patience and support!

1.01.title: Skew-You, Bugs!
1.01.description:
‚Ä¢ Loading layers into Skew is now substantially more reliable.
‚Ä¢ Label colors are now fully supported for non-English versions of After-Effects.
‚Ä¢ Added the option to snooze notifications regarding new versions of Skew
‚Ä¢Other smol bug fixes and improvements
